participant_1.background:
I'm proud of being able to juggle my blog and being a mom of five.
I love to challenge myself physically and mentally, and I find that yoga provides the perfect opportunity for both.
i cannot drive.
i do not like to clean house.
I'm not that much into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a constant source of comfort and love.
i am bipolar.
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
I've had my cards read a couple of times.
I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.

content.text: I am doing great, thank you! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am a mom of five, and I have a blog that I like to write about my experiences as a parent.
That is amazing! I do not have any kids, but I love animals. My dog is my best friend.
That is great! I love animals too. I have three dogs and a cat.
Wow, that is a lot of pets! I bet your house is very busy.
It can be, but it is also very much fun. I love being around my pets.
I can imagine! I love to go to the zoo and pet all the animals.
That is always a great time. I love to go to the zoo too.
What is your favorite thing to do with your kids?
I love to play games with them, read to them, and go on adventures.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I bet your kids love it.
They do! They are always asking me to play with them.
That is so cute! I am glad that you have such a great relationship with your kids.
Thanks! I am too. I am so lucky to have them in my life.
